page.title: 15The Warmington Valley #3
page.content:
The villagers now face the sad prospect of the{M40 Motorway}being built straight down the middle of the valley on the line of the stream.
The work is due to start in 1990.This follows considerable delays due to public enquiries and a well fought battle by local conservationists to get agreement to the re-routing outside the valley.
The farmers will benefit from the compulsory purchase of their now improved land,the local lane across the valley will be diverted,the stream will be diverted and possibly polluted and a bridge will be built over the Motorway to re-link Mollington and Warmington.
